name: Vivid Conceptions
storyline: In Vivid Conceptions you play the role of the last surviving Bantam on earth, who is a creature that predated even the dinosaurs but could barely fit on the tip of a needle. It’s your job to journey across the underground in search of the last refuge on the planet…
summary:
Vivid Conceptions is a plattform/puzzle game, starring a tiny prehistoric creature known as a "Bantam".

The Bantam has several special powers: forcefield, telekinesis, and the most characteristic one—the ability to spawn forth tiny baby Bantams to do errands for him. It is with these powers, and traditional platforming skills, that the Bantam must make his way through grim grasslands and gloomy meadows, facing insects and powerful bosses along the way.
